Articles.Content:
This is one of my first posts but i felt like sharing this craft with you all.

I build things in KSP thats the most fun for me.... i mean it's like Lego! anyway I build stuff to look cool but at the same time be functional.

I want to present The Kerbwing. My first and only creation this far.

have you ever heard of the Batwing? well this is a Spaceplane based on that design for the superhero Batman...maybe we have any aspiring Kerbal heroes that want there own Spaceplane?

It features:

3 Jet engines

2 Rocket engines

1 Docking port

4 Solar panels

Various lights

an ejectionseat if you ever would need it.

The fuel is routed with fuellines so the fuel drains from the back of the plane to the front to gain stability and avoid flipping.

The mods I use for this craft is Mechjeb, engineer, KSPX

The craft itself is mostly Stock really, i've got a few fueltanks that are not stock but the rest is.

Action groups

1: Activate Rockets

2: Activate Jets

3: Close/open Air intakes

9: Open/ Close Solar panels

10: open/ Close Docking port

Thats it and here it is:

Craft File: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21296321/Kerbwing.craft

I am very interested in critique and sugestions to make this fine craft even better.

Im sorry for any spelling errors, this is not my native tounge

Enjoy!

Nice, But..

Why is this a mod craft?

Nice, But..

Why is this a mod craft?

Its a mod craft because it uses the KW rocketry mod and the KSPX mod.
Hopefully within the next couple of game releases all of the kspx parts will be part of the stock load out
I like the shape, might try to recreate my own version with stock.

Nice craft.

I hope if one day I'll be able of makin' an cool plane like this one too.

Thanks for the kind words.

Any suggestions for improvements?
